javelin.model.item

Class Wand

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.item.Item
      • javelin.model.item.Wand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Wand
extends Item
    A wand is ideally a item that fires a ray. It has up to 50 charges and is spent when empty.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
